3: Liv, do you know how to fortify the wall?
I'll go handle logistics with the support force.
Is this how you Gray Ravens manage this?!
But the defense planning for the base is in complete disarray and not up to par. Looks like I have to do it myself!
Then all I can do is try my best. Looks like I'm going to be staying with the Gray Ravens longer than I expected!
Can I tear down the pile of materials over there and have a look? I bet there are treasures in there!
I just finished packing all of that up! There's nothing but junk in it!
Nanami! Are you here to help or cause trouble?!
Ahhh!... Never mind. I'll go out hunting Corrupted for a while. Out of side, out of mind!
